
.. code:: python

    import pandas as pd
    import malaya

.. code:: python

    df = pd.read_csv('tests/02032018.csv',sep=';')
    df = df.iloc[3:,1:]
    df.columns = ['text','label']
    corpus = df.text.tolist()

Train LDA2Vec model
-------------------

.. code:: python

    lda2vec = malaya.topic_model.lda2vec(corpus, 10, vectorizer = 'skip-gram', skip = 4)


.. parsed-literal::

Get topics
^^^^^^^^^^

You able to set to return as Pandas Dataframe or not by using
``return_df`` parameter

.. code:: python

    lda2vec.top_topics(5, top_n = 10, return_df = True)

Important sentences based on topics
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code:: python

    lda2vec.get_sentences(5)




.. parsed-literal::

    ['esok jual daging ekor lembu ekor sembelih sabtu',
     'cari temu pesawat hilang',
     'pandai pandai takut pecat minit',
     'kumpul terima faedah tumbuh',
     'putus majlis umno tangguh pilih parti canggah fasal lembaga umno']



Get topics
^^^^^^^^^^

.. code:: python

    lda2vec.get_topics(10)




.. parsed-literal::

    [(0,
      'negara bangun main bangun ekonomi negara timbang tulis arus jemaah wanita tingkat maju didik ketua manusia rangka program teknikal'),

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code:: python

    lda2vec.visualize_topics(notebook_mode = True)

    function LDAvis_load_lib(url, callback){
      var s = document.createElement('script');
      s.src = url;
      s.async = true;
      s.onreadystatechange = s.onload = callback;
      s.onerror = function(){console.warn("failed to load library " + url);};
      document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
    }

Train LDA model
---------------

.. code:: python

    lda = malaya.topic_model.lda(corpus,10,stemming=False,vectorizer='skip-gram',ngram=(1,4),skip=3)


.. parsed-literal::

    /usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/sklearn/decomposition/online_lda.py:536: DeprecationWarning: The default value for 'learning_method' will be changed from 'online' to 'batch' in the release 0.20. This warning was introduced in 0.18.
      DeprecationWarning)

    function LDAvis_load_lib(url, callback){
      var s = document.createElement('script');
      s.src = url;
      s.async = true;
      s.onreadystatechange = s.onload = callback;
      s.onerror = function(){console.warn("failed to load library " + url);};
      document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);
    }

    if(typeof(LDAvis) !== "undefined"){
       // already loaded: just create the visualization
       !function(LDAvis){
           new LDAvis("#" + "ldavis_el9235150910946009350850444", ldavis_el9235150910946009350850444_data);
       }(LDAvis);
    }else if(typeof define === "function" && define.amd){
       // require.js is available: use it to load d3/LDAvis

            new LDAvis("#" + "ldavis_el9235150910946009350850444", ldavis_el9235150910946009350850444_data);

Train NMF model
---------------

.. code:: python

    nmf = malaya.topic_model.nmf(corpus,10)
    nmf.top_topics(5, top_n = 10, return_df = True)

Train LSA model
---------------

.. code:: python

    lsa = malaya.topic_model.lsa(corpus,10)
    lsa.top_topics(5, top_n = 10, return_df = True)
